articles.author: Omar Sohail
articles.title: M5 MacBook Pro’s Single Fan Cooler Unable To Prevent Thermal Throttling; Chipset Can Reach 99 Degrees Celsius When Under Load, But Runs Cooler Than M4 - Wccftech
articles.description: Despite being extremely power efficient, Apple’s newest M5 MacBook Pro can get insanely hot, with the SoC reaching 99 degrees Celsius
articles.content: Apples shift towards its in-house chipsets means that machines like the M5 MacBook Pro will not have to deal with Intel processors overheating the moment you reach the home screen, but that does not … [+3150 chars]
